title: Allow Natalia Lafourcade to Reintroduce Herself
description: After years of recording homages to Latin American greats, the Mexican singer-songwriter re-emerges with an LP that features new collaborators, including Marc Ribot.
dc:creator: Ed Morales
media:credit: Dana Golan for The New York Times
media:description: “De Todas las Flores” (“Of All the Flowers”) is Natalia Lafourcade’s first album of all-original material since her Grammy-winning 2015 LP, “Hasta la Raíz” (“To the Root”).
